results.title: [Effect of statin therapy on mortality in patients with non-ischemic dilated cardiomyopathy].
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVE: To explore the effect of early statin therapy (@CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@) on mortality in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Nonsyndromic_Holoprosencephaly</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C580335 @@@non@@@-@DISEASE_Brain_Ischemia @DISEASE_MESH:D002545 @@@ischemic@@@ @DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Dilated @DISEASE_MESH:D002311 @@@dilated cardiomyopathy@@@.
